en: Burglars broke into his house.
zh: 窃贼闯入了他的房子。

en: There are several ways to measure speed.
zh: 有很多种测量速度的方法。

en: Speeding causes accidents.
zh: 超速会导致事故。

en: Please send it by special delivery.
zh: 请用特快专递寄送。

en: Can you make it special delivery?
zh: 能用特快专递寄吗？

en: Please send it by express mail.
zh: 请用快递寄送。

en: I can't keep pace with you.
zh: 我跟不上你的速度。

en: Alphonse looked at the racing clouds, his eyes turned to the sky.
zh: 阿方斯看着飞驰的云朵，他的眼睛转向天空。

en: Soon gotten soon spent.
zh: 来得快，去得也快。

en: Run fast, otherwise you will miss the bus.
zh: 快跑，不然你会错过公共汽车的。

en: Run fast, and you will catch the train.
zh: 快跑，你就能赶上火车。

en: Run fast, or you will be late for school.
zh: 快跑，不然你上学就要迟到了。

en: I am tired from running fast.
zh: 我跑得太快，累了。

en: "Come home early, Bill." "Yes, Mother."
zh: “比尔，早点回家。” “好的，妈妈。”

en: Whether you drive fast or slow, drive carefully.
zh: 无论你开快还是开慢，都要小心驾驶。

en: I'm going to bed.
zh: 我要睡觉了。

en: I am going to bed.
zh: 我要睡觉了。

en: I am going to bed!
zh: 我要睡觉了！

en: If you can read rapidly and with good understanding, you will probably find it easy to remember a good deal of what you do read.
zh: 如果你能快速且理解透彻地阅读，你可能会发现很容易记住你所读的大部分内容。

en: The race is not to the swift.
zh: 比赛不在于跑得快。

en: He slowed into step with her.
zh: 他放慢脚步与她并肩而行。

en: That will not make even carfare.
zh: 那甚至不够车费。

en: She is struggling helplessly.
zh: 她正在无助地挣扎。

en: The footprints continued down to the river.
zh: 脚印一直延伸到河边。

en: Footprints were left on the floor.
zh: 地板上留下了脚印。

en: This book is my good luck charm; I read it every five months.
zh: 这本书是我的幸运符；我每五个月读一遍。

en: This book is my good luck charm. I read it every five months.
zh: 这本书是我的幸运符。我每五个月读一遍。

en: A sprained ankle disabled him from walking for a month.
zh: 脚踝扭伤使他一个月不能走路。

en: I'll read a book while you're sleeping.
zh: 你睡觉的时候我看看书。

en: I am sorry to encumber you with the children.
zh: 我很抱歉让孩子们给您添麻烦了。

en: Watch your step. The floor is slippery.
zh: 小心脚下，地板很滑。

en: Do watch your step.
zh: 务必小心脚下。

en: Watch your step, or else you will trip on the baggage.
zh: 小心脚下，否则你会被行李绊倒。

en: Watch your step, or you will slip and fall.
zh: 小心脚下，不然你会滑倒。

en: Watch your step. The stairs are steep.
zh: 小心脚下，楼梯很陡。

en: Watch your step.
zh: 小心脚下。

en: It's dark, so watch your step.
zh: 天黑了，小心脚下。

en: The moment I heard the footsteps, I knew who it was.
zh: 我一听到脚步声，就知道是谁了。

en: I didn't mean to step on your foot.
zh: 我不是故意踩到你的脚的。

en: Wash your feet.
zh: 洗脚吧。

en: Bathe your feet to get the dirt off.
zh: 洗洗脚，把泥洗掉。

en: In order to keep our feet warm we had to shift from one foot to another and keep moving.
zh: 为了保持脚的温暖，我们不得不从一只脚换到另一只脚，并且不停地移动。

en: His bad leg prevented him from winning the race.
zh: 他那条不好的腿使他无法赢得比赛。

en: We're short of something.
zh: 我们缺了点什么。

en: What do you have your feet for?
zh: 你要脚有什么用？

en: Soles of the feet are insensitive to heat and cold.
zh: 脚底对冷热不敏感。

en: My legs are getting better day by day.
zh: 我的腿一天比一天好。

en: A fast walker can walk six kilometers in an hour.
zh: 一个走得快的人一小时能走六公里。

en: Watch your toes.
zh: 小心你的脚趾。

en: Be careful not to drop anything on your feet.
zh: 小心别把东西掉在脚上。

en: I have a pain in my little toe.
zh: 我的小脚趾头疼。

en: There is no feeling in my toes at all.
zh: 我的脚趾头完全没有感觉。

en: We let our legs do the leading.
zh: 我们让腿来带路。

en: I have had a corn removed from my foot.
zh: 我脚上的鸡眼已经除掉了。

en: His leg will prevent him from participating in a tennis tournament.
zh: 他的腿会让他无法参加网球比赛。

en: I walked around town wherever my feet led me.
zh: 我随意地在城里走动，走到哪算哪。

en: I burnt myself on the leg.
zh: 我的腿被烫伤了。

en: I've got blisters on my feet.
zh: 我的脚上起了水泡。

en: My leg got hurt, so I could not walk.
zh: 我的腿受伤了，所以我不能走路。

en: It is possible for us to do addition very quickly.
zh: 我们可以非常快地做加法。

en: My feet get cold.
zh: 我的脚很冷。

en: I walked till my legs got stiff.
zh: 我走到腿都僵硬了。

en: My legs feel heavy as lead.
zh: 我的腿感觉像灌了铅一样沉重。

en: I have sore feet.
zh: 我的脚很痛。

en: My feet hurt.
zh: 我的脚疼。

en: My foot hurts.
zh: 我的脚疼。

en: My leg hurts.
zh: 我的腿疼。

en: My legs hurt.
zh: 我的腿疼。

en: My legs are hurting.
zh: 我的腿很疼。

en: Your feet are dirty.
zh: 你的脚很脏。

en: I tripped and nearly fell.
zh: 我绊了一下，差点摔倒。

en: If your feet get wet, you'll get a cold.
zh: 如果你的脚湿了，你会感冒的。

en: If your feet get wet, you'll catch a cold.
zh: 如果你的脚湿了，你会感冒的。

en: My legs feel heavy.
zh: 我的腿感觉很沉重。

en: My feet went to sleep and I couldn't stand up.
zh: 我的脚麻了，站不起来。

en: I have feeling in my legs.
zh: 我的腿有感觉。

en: I've got pins and needles in my leg.
zh: 我的腿麻了。

en: Precision in measurement is a necessity.
zh: 测量的精确性是必要的。

en: Let's ease up.
zh: 咱们放松点吧。

en: I get out of breath.
zh: 我气喘吁吁。

en: He wanted them to go to college and learn to be businessmen.
zh: 他希望他们上大学，学习成为商人。

en: I went for a walk with my son.
zh: 我和我儿子去散步了。

en: Do I have to bring my son to your office?
zh: 我必须带我儿子去你的办公室吗？

en: Everyone sympathized with the parents about their son's death.
zh: 每个人都对这对父母失去儿子表示同情。

en: I am not so poor that I cannot send my son to college.
zh: 我还没穷到不能送我儿子上大学的地步。

en: He launched his son in the world.
zh: 他让他的儿子开始独立生活。

en: I commit my son to your care.
zh: 我把儿子托付给你照顾。

en: My son lives in a distant place.
zh: 我儿子住在遥远的地方。

en: My son likes outdoor sports, such as baseball, tennis and soccer.
zh: 我儿子喜欢户外运动，比如棒球、网球和足球。

en: My son is busy studying for the examinations tomorrow.
zh: 我儿子正忙着准备明天的考试。

en: The son asked a question of his mother.
zh: 儿子问了他妈妈一个问题。

en: My son took a candy from the box.
zh: 我儿子从盒子里拿了一颗糖。

en: My son took a piece of candy from the box.
zh: 我儿子从盒子里拿了一块糖。

en: My son is small for his age.
zh: 我儿子比同龄人矮小。

en: Both sons pretended to the throne.
zh: 两个儿子都觊觎王位。

en: My son has taken to drinking and smoking.
zh: 我儿子开始喝酒和抽烟了。

en: My son is ashamed of his behavior.
zh: 我儿子为他的行为感到羞愧。

en: The son acquiesced in his parents' wishes.
zh: 儿子默许了父母的愿望。

en: My son gets on very well at school.
zh: 我儿子在学校表现很好。

en: My son is playing in the rain.
zh: 我儿子正在雨中玩耍。

en: My son has gone to America to study medicine.
zh: 我儿子去美国学医了。

en: My son went to London, where I was born.
zh: 我儿子去了伦敦，那是我出生的地方。

en: My son is now as tall as I am.
zh: 我儿子现在和我一样高了。

en: I cannot help thinking that my son is still alive.
zh: 我不禁觉得我儿子还活着。

en: My son can't count yet.
zh: 我儿子还不会数数。

en: My son is not old enough for school.
zh: 我儿子还没到上学的年龄。

en: My son was the last but one to reach the goal.
zh: 我儿子是倒数第二个到达终点的。

en: My son is tired of hamburgers.
zh: 我儿子吃腻了汉堡包。

en: My son asks for the moon.
zh: 我儿子异想天开。

en: The son demonstrated his anger by shutting the door and noisily.
zh: 儿子砰地关上门，以此来表达他的愤怒。

en: My son often worries me by asking a lot of questions.
zh: 我儿子总是问很多问题，让我很担心。

en: Our son was unable to keep up with the class.
zh: 我们的儿子跟不上班里的进度。

en: My son has read every book on that shelf.
zh: 我儿子读了那个架子上所有的书。

en: My son passed in three subjects at A level.
zh: 我儿子在A level考试中通过了三门科目。

en: His son's criminal activities caused him great pain.
zh: 他儿子的犯罪行为给他带来了巨大的痛苦。

en: All my son's adult teeth are in.
zh: 我儿子所有的恒牙都长出来了。

en: My son's front teeth have come in crooked.
zh: 我儿子的门牙长歪了。

en: My son's ability at math has improved this year.
zh: 我儿子今年的数学能力提高了。

en: I am to blame for my son's failure.
zh: 我应该为我儿子的失败负责。

en: I'd like to make an appointment for fluoride treatments for my son.
zh: 我想为我儿子预约氟化物治疗。

en: Please give him a fluoride treatment.
zh: 请给他做一次氟化物治疗。

en: The moment she heard the news of her son's death, she burst into tears.
zh: 她一听到儿子去世的消息，就 burst into tears.

en: Her son's death broke Mary's heart.
zh: 她儿子的去世让玛丽心碎。

en: His heart ached when he saw his son's miserable state.
zh: 当他看到儿子悲惨的境况时，他感到心痛。

en: I'd like to see my son.
zh: 我想见见我儿子。

en: My son is my biggest headache.
zh: 我儿子真让我头疼。

en: The mere thought of her son warmed her heart.
zh: 一想到她的儿子，她心里就暖暖的。

en: I'm never free from worry about my son. Nowadays, he does nothing but play video games, and never studies at all.
zh: 我总是为我儿子操心。现在他什么都不做，只知道玩游戏，根本不学习。

en: I thank you on behalf of my son.
zh: 我代表我的儿子感谢你。

en: I must buy a new suit for my son.
zh: 我得给我儿子买一套新西装。

en: I built my son a new house.
zh: 我为我儿子盖了一栋新房子。

en: I asked my son what he really wanted.
zh: 我问我儿子他真正想要什么。

en: Keep your son from having his own way.
zh: 别让你儿子为所欲为。

en: You shouldn't allow your son to act like a selfish brat.
zh: 你不应该让你儿子像个自私的熊孩子一样。

en: You shouldn't allow your son to always have his own way.
zh: 你不应该总是让你儿子为所欲为。

en: I was disappointed in my son.
zh: 我对我的儿子感到失望。

en: My son shall do the work.
zh: 这工作由我儿子来做。

en: I gave my son a box of candy, which he opened happily.
zh: 我给了我儿子一盒糖果，他高兴地打开了。

en: My sons are in the heyday of youth.
zh: 我的儿子们正值青春年华。

en: Her sons have gone to Tokyo.
zh: 她的儿子们去东京了。

en: Your son must be quite tall by now.
zh: 你儿子现在一定很高了吧。

en: Your son is almost the copy of your father.
zh: 你儿子简直是你父亲的翻版。

en: Your son will be well taken care of.
zh: 你的儿子会被照顾好的。

en: You need not have any anxiety about your son's health.
zh: 你不用担心你儿子的健康。

en: Did you choose an interesting book for your son?
zh: 你给你儿子选了一本有趣的书吗？

en: What does your son do?
zh: 你儿子是做什么的？

en: It will cost you a fortune to give your son a good education.
zh: 为了让你儿子接受良好的教育，你得花一大笔钱。

en: Give my thanks to your son.
zh: 请代我向你的儿子致谢。

en: Don't be so hard on your son.
zh: 别对你儿子太苛刻了。

en: She was very pleased when her son returned home safe and sound.
zh: 当她的儿子平安回家时，她非常高兴。

en: Have you ever heard from your son?
zh: 你有没有收到你儿子的消息？

en: She scolded her son for being lazy.
zh: 她因为儿子懒惰而责骂了他。

en: Great was her joy when her son returned back safely.
zh: 当她的儿子平安归来时，她欣喜若狂。

en: Their son's success in the examination gave them great pleasure.
zh: 他们的儿子在考试中取得成功，这让他们非常高兴。

en: My son came to my room.
zh: 我儿子来到我的房间。

en: My son owes what he is to you.
zh: 我儿子的成就归功于你。

en: I hope my son will bring himself to study hard.
zh: 我希望我的儿子会努力学习。

en: When my son is doing nothing bad, he is sleeping.
zh: 当我的儿子没有做坏事时，他就在睡觉。

en: My son has got into bad company.
zh: 我儿子交了坏朋友。

en: My son came to see me from time to time.
zh: 我儿子不时地来看我。

en: I was out of breath and sat down.
zh: 我气喘吁吁，坐了下来。

en: I blew on my hands to warm them.
zh: 我对着我的手吹气来暖和它们。

en: Take a deep breath, please.
zh: 请深呼吸。

en: Take a deep breath in and out, please.
zh: 请深吸一口气，然后再呼出来。

en: Take a deep breath.
zh: 深呼吸。

en: Hold your breath and pinch your nostrils.
zh: 屏住呼吸，捏住鼻孔。

en: Hold your breath, please.
zh: 请屏住呼吸。

en: Take a breath and hold it.
zh: 吸一口气，屏住。

en: This is going to require a long steady effort.
zh: 这需要长期不懈的努力。

en: She could scarcely gasp the words.
zh: 她几乎喘不过气来说出这些话。

en: A gardener was called in to design the garden.
zh: 请了一位园丁来设计花园。

en: Without him nothing was made that has been made.
zh: 没有他，凡被造的，没有一样被造的。

en: I have some gifts.
zh: 我有一些礼物。

en: On gift-giving occasions, people generally avoid giving money, but there are exceptions.
zh: 在送礼的场合，人们通常避免送钱，但也有例外。

en: Thank you very much for your present.
zh: 非常感谢你的礼物。

en: Thank you for the present.
zh: 谢谢你的礼物。

en: A present is usually given in return for one's hospitality.
zh: 礼物通常是为了回报别人的款待而赠送的。

en: Choose a present carefully.
zh: 仔细挑选礼物。

en: A card was attached to the gift.
zh: 礼品上附有一张卡片。

en: Would you mind wrapping it up as a gift?
zh: 你介意把它包装成礼物吗？

en: This is also ideal as a gift.
zh: 这个也很适合作为礼物。

en: Do you want me to wrap it up as a gift?
zh: 要我把它包成礼物吗？

en: It is one thing to own a library; It is quite another to use it wisely.
zh: 拥有一个图书馆是一回事；明智地使用它又是另一回事。

en: More than half of my books were destroyed by the fire last night.
zh: 昨晚的火灾烧毁了我一半以上的书。

en: To own a library is one thing and to use it is another.
zh: 拥有一个图书馆是一回事，使用它又是另一回事。

en: Ill weeds grow apace.
zh: 坏草长得快。

en: Masuo can bend spoons.
zh: 增尾能把勺子弄弯。

en: The tax increases affected our lives greatly.
zh: 税收增加极大地影响了我们的生活。

en: Additional imports of American beef are planned to meet rising demand.
zh: 计划增加美国牛肉的进口，以满足不断增长的需求。

en: Their wish is engraved on the base of the statue.
zh: 他们的愿望刻在雕像的底座上。

en: Loud music always makes Fred hit the roof.
zh: 大声的音乐总是让弗雷德暴跳如雷。

en: When Fred hears loud music, he gets annoyed.
zh: 当弗雷德听到大声的音乐时，他会感到恼火。

en: Large planes brought about large amounts of sound pollution.
zh: 大型飞机带来了大量的噪音污染。

en: Noise pollution could be avoided if only people were more sensitive to the environment.
zh: 如果人们对环境更敏感，噪音污染是可以避免的。

en: The noise lessened gradually.
zh: 噪音逐渐减小。

en: Noise is the most serious problem for those who live around the airports.
zh: 对于住在机场周围的人来说，噪音是最严重的问题。

en: They didn't notice the increase in noise.
zh: 他们没有注意到噪音的增加。

en: I was kept awake all night by the noise.
zh: 噪音吵得我整夜没睡。

en: I found it difficult to make myself heard due to the noise.
zh: 由于噪音，我发现很难让人听到我的声音。

en: I found it difficult to make myself heard because of the noise.
zh: 因为噪音，我发现很难让人听到我的声音。

en: I couldn't make myself heard above the noise.
zh: 我无法在噪音之上让别人听到我的声音。

en: I'm going crazy from too much noise.
zh: 我快被太多的噪音逼疯了。

en: The loud noise is driving me crazy.
zh: 这巨大的噪音快把我逼疯了。

en: My head is splitting from the noise.
zh: 噪音吵得我头都快裂开了。

en: I could not make myself heard above the noise.
zh: 我无法在噪音之上让别人听到我的声音。

en: The noise bothers me.
zh: 这噪音让我很烦。

en: Noises interfered with my studying.
zh: 噪音干扰了我的学习。

en: The noise disturbed his sleep.
zh: 噪音打扰了他的睡眠。

en: To no one's surprise, loud noise has been proved to affect one's sense of hearing.
zh: 不出所料，事实证明，巨大的噪音会影响人的听觉。

en: There was so much noise that Professor Bayley couldn't make himself heard.
zh: 噪音太大了，贝利教授无法让别人听到他的声音。

en: The teacher told the boy not to make noise.
zh: 老师告诉那个男孩不要吵闹。

en: People who make no noise are dangerous.
zh: 不声不响的人是危险的。

en: The trouble blew over in a few days.
zh: 风波几天后就过去了。

en: The beginning of the trouble was his careless remark.
zh: 麻烦的起因是他那句不谨慎的话。

en: You must not be noisy.
zh: 你们不要吵闹。

en: I could hear someone calling my name on the noisy platform.
zh: 我在嘈杂的站台上听到有人在叫我的名字。

en: Don't make noise. Keep quiet.
zh: 别吵闹。保持安静。

en: The bus driver glared at us for shouting.
zh: 公共汽车司机瞪了我们一眼，因为我们大喊大叫。

en: Frost is frozen dew.
zh: 霜是冻结的露水。

en: The frost had a bad effect on the crops.
zh: 霜对农作物产生了不良影响。

en: The frost killed all the flowers.
zh: 霜冻杀死了所有的花。

en: The hoarfrost has not begun to thaw yet.
zh: 白霜还没有开始融化。

en: Frost touched the flowers.
zh: 霜冻侵袭了花朵。

en: The frost did much harm to the crops.
zh: 霜冻对农作物造成了很大的损害。

en: The frost did a lot of damage to the crops.
zh: 霜冻对农作物造成了很大的破坏。

en: Frost touched the flower.
zh: 霜冻侵袭了花朵。

en: The farewell party will be given next week.
zh: 告别会将在下周举行。

en: The runner had reached the halfway mark.
zh: 赛跑者已经到达了中途。

en: The runner was called out at third.
zh: 跑垒员在三垒被判出局。

en: What will become of our close relations if the bilateral security treaty expires?

en: I believe in early rising.

zh: 早起对健康有益。

en: Get up early, or you'll be late.

en: He who laughs last laughs best.

en: Come quick!

en: Come quickly!

en: Get ready quickly.

en: I can't walk fast, but I can walk for a long time.
zh: 我不能走得快，但我能走很久。

en: You've arrived too early.

en: I go to bed early so I can get up to capture the sunrise.
zh: 我早睡是为了早起看日出。

en: I suggested that we should start early.
zh: 我建议我们应该早点开始。

en: We agreed on an early start.

en: Let's start early, shall we?

en: Let's leave early.

en: Would it be better to start early?

en: You have only to leave early to get a good seat.

en: I hope you'll recover quickly.
zh: 我希望你早日康复。

en: If we begin early, we can finish by lunch.
zh: 如果我们早点开始，我们就能在午饭前完成。

en: Sooner begun, sooner done.
zh: 早开始，早完成。

en: Get up early.
zh: 早点起床。

en: I hope you'll make up your mind quickly.
zh: 我希望你尽快下定决心。

en: You had better get up early.
zh: 你最好早点起床。

en: You should get up early.
zh: 你应该早点起床。

en: You'd better get up early.
zh: 你最好早点起床。

en: If you get up early, you can be in time for school.
zh: 如果你早点起床，你就能及时赶到学校。

en: Get up early, else you'll be late for school.
zh: 早点起床，否则你上学就要迟到了。

en: Remind him to come home early.
zh: 提醒他早点回家。

en: You had best go home early.
zh: 你最好早点回家。

en: You should go home early.
zh: 你应该早点回家。

en: Go home quickly.
zh: 快点回家。

en: Come home early, Bill.
zh: 比尔，早点回家。

en: Come home early.
zh: 早点回家。

en: You may go as long as you come home early.
zh: 只要你早点回家，你就可以去。

en: If you come back soon, you may go.
zh: 如果你早点回来，你就可以去。

en: You can go out, as long as you promise to be back early.
zh: 只要你答应早点回来，你就可以出去。

en: Come here soon.
zh: 快点过来。

en: I wrote him a letter and asked him to return home soon.
zh: 我给他写了封信，让他早点回家。

en: I wrote him a letter asking him to come home soon.
zh: 我给他写了封信，让他早点回家。

en: I hope you get well soon.
zh: 希望你早日康复。

en: I'm sorry I couldn't write to you sooner.
zh: 很抱歉没能早点给你写信。

en: Make with the beers, I'm thirsty!
zh: 快点拿啤酒来，我渴了！

en: Be quick! We haven't much time.
zh: 快点！我们没多少时间了。

en: It was her fate to die young.
zh: 她注定要英年早逝。

en: I hope you will answer soon.
zh: 希望你尽快回复。

en: Why don't you have your bath now?
zh: 你为什么不现在洗澡呢？

en: Take a shower, now!
zh: 现在就去洗澡！

en: You are early.
zh: 你来早了。

en: First come, first served.
zh: 先到先得。

en: To cut a long story short, he was fired.
zh: 长话短说，他被解雇了。

en: Puppets work with wires.

en: May I use the vacuum cleaner?

zh: 搜寻队发现他躺在悬崖脚下。

en: I found what I was looking for.

en: I used my imagination.

en: Imagination is the root of all civilization.
zh: 想象力是所有文明的根源。

en: I couldn't even guess.

en: When is the pep rally?

en: Mr Miyake showed me lots of places during my stay in Kurashiki.
zh: 我在仓敷逗留期间，三宅先生带我去了很多地方。

en: Who was it that forgot to lock the door of the warehouse?
zh: 是谁忘记锁仓库的门了？

en: The warehouse was empty except for a piece of furniture.
zh: 仓库是空的，除了一件家具。

en: You cannot learn the truth unless you hear what both parties have to say.
zh: 除非你听取双方的意见，否则你无法了解真相。

en: It was a long war because neither side would give in.
zh: 这是一场漫长的战争，因为双方都不肯让步。

en: Both sides had to compromise with each other.
zh: 双方都必须互相妥协。

en: It is sometimes difficult to tell twins apart.
zh: 有时很难区分双胞胎。

en: The Brown twins, both of whom got recently married, held a party.
zh: 布朗双胞胎最近都结婚了，他们举办了一个派对。

en: You must exercise your imagination.
zh: 你必须发挥你的想象力。

en: Rats desert a sinking ship.
zh: 老鼠会抛弃即将沉没的船。

en: The lawsuit remains undecided.
zh: 诉讼仍然悬而未决。

en: With the money Jack won from his lawsuit, he should be able to live on easy street.
zh: 杰克从诉讼中赢得的钱，应该足够他过上舒适的生活了。

en: In the "Mafia" tradition of organized crime, any member who discloses its operation is sure to be rubbed out.
zh: 在有组织犯罪的“黑手党”传统中，任何泄露其运作的成员肯定会被干掉。

zh: 从组织培养的角度来看，这个实验的环境应该被更严格地定义。

en: The union members were up in arms.
zh: 工会成员非常愤怒。

en: The union went out on a strike for an indefinite period.
zh: 工会无限期罢工。

en: The union bargained with the management.
zh: 工会与管理层进行了谈判。

en: Did the union participate in the demonstration?
zh: 工会参加了示威游行吗？

en: The union won a 5% wage increase.
zh: 工会赢得了 5% 的工资增长。

en: The union is pressing for a ten-percent pay hike.
zh: 工会正在争取 10% 的加薪。

en: The leaders of the Union agitated for higher wages.
zh: 工会领导人积极争取更高的工资。

en: It is improper to impose sanctions upon the union.
zh: 对工会实施制裁是不恰当的。

en: The union and the company have come to terms on a new contract.
zh: 工会和公司在新合同上达成了协议。

en: Forming a cabinet is difficult.
zh: 组建内阁是很困难的。

en: A nice room, isn't it?
zh: 多好的房间啊，不是吗？

en: Those are nice gloves you have on.
zh: 你戴的手套真漂亮。

en: What a nice car you have! You must have paid a lot for it.
zh: 你的车真漂亮！你一定花了不少钱吧。

en: What a nice car you have! You must've paid a lot for it.
zh: 你的车真漂亮！你肯定花了不少钱吧。

en: You have done a wonderful job.
zh: 你做得太棒了。

en: Have a nice holiday.
zh: 祝你假期愉快。

en: We had a glorious time.
zh: 我们度过了一段美好的时光。

en: That's a nice tie you're wearing.
zh: 你戴的领带真漂亮。

en: I found a nice cup.
zh: 我找到了一个漂亮的杯子。

en: Thank you for sending me a nice card.
zh: 谢谢你寄给我一张漂亮的卡片。

en: Frankly speaking, you made a mistake.
zh: 坦率地说，你犯了一个错误。

en: Frankly speaking, he is untrustworthy.
zh: 坦率地说，他不可靠。

en: A fast child may win the race, but even a slow child can compete.
zh: 跑得快的孩子可能会赢得比赛，但即使是跑得慢的孩子也可以参加比赛。

en: Anxious for a quick decision, the chairman called for a vote.
zh: 由于渴望尽快做出决定，主席要求投票。

en: The United States is a paradise for almost every kind of sports, thanks to its wonderfully varied climate.
zh: 由于气候变化多样，美国几乎是各种运动的天堂。

en: All the best wishes on this wonderful day.
zh: 在这个美好的日子里，祝你一切顺利。

en: Isn't this weather just great!
zh: 这天气真是太棒了，不是吗！

en: Lovely day, isn't it?
zh: 天气真好，不是吗？

en: Hope you'll have a wonderful birthday.
zh: 祝你生日快乐。

en: A wonderful idea occurred to me.
zh: 我突然有了一个绝妙的主意。

en: A wonderful idea just ran through my mind.
zh: 我脑海中突然闪过一个绝妙的主意。

en: Kudos for your outstanding achievement!
zh: 恭喜你取得的杰出成就！

en: I hope you'll have a great year.
zh: 祝你今年一切顺利。

en: Ah, wonderful.
zh: 啊，太棒了。

en: Marvellous.
zh: 太棒了。

en: Wonderful.
zh: 太好了。

en: Takuya swam naked as a jaybird.
zh: 拓也一丝不挂地游泳。

en: This is just a small gift, but please accept it.
zh: 这只是一个小礼物，请收下。

en: My grandmother has got old.
zh: 我的奶奶老了。

en: My grandma has gotten very old.
zh: 我的奶奶年纪很大了。

en: My grandmother has become old.
zh: 我的奶奶变老了。

en: Grandmother is bent double with age.
zh: 奶奶老得直不起腰了。

en: My grandmother likes traveling by train.
zh: 我的奶奶喜欢坐火车旅行。

en: My grandmother was pulling up weeds in her backyard.
zh: 我的奶奶在后院拔草。

en: My grandmother wears a dress to rags.
zh: 我的奶奶把一件连衣裙穿得破破烂烂。

en: My grandmother left us a great fortune.
zh: 我的奶奶给我们留下了一大笔财富。

en: My aunt lives in a lonely house in the country.
zh: 我的姑妈住在乡下一栋偏僻的房子里。

en: Grandmother mows the grass in the garden.
zh: 奶奶在花园里割草。

en: My grandmother lives in the country.
zh: 我的奶奶住在乡下。

en: My grandmother became sick last week.
zh: 我的奶奶上周病了。

en: My grandmother never changed her style of living.
zh: 我的奶奶从未改变她的生活方式。

en: My grandmother is hard of hearing. In other words she is slightly deaf.
zh: 我的奶奶耳朵不好使了。换句话说，她有点耳背。

en: My grandmother walks faster than me, and plays tennis better than I do.
zh: 我的奶奶比我走得快，网球也比我打得好。

en: My grandmother made me a new dress.
zh: 我的奶奶给我做了一件新连衣裙。

en: Grandmother sent us a box of apples.
zh: 奶奶给我们寄了一箱苹果。

en: My grandmother told me the story of Cinderella.
zh: 我的奶奶给我讲了灰姑娘的故事。

en: My grandmother passed away peacefully last night.
zh: 我的奶奶昨晚安详地去世了。

en: My grandmother had been sick for a week when I visited her.
zh: 我去看奶奶的时候，她已经病了一个星期了。

en: My grandmother is very forgetful of things nowadays.
zh: 我的奶奶现在很健忘。

en: Grandmother believes that Chinese medicines are the best.
zh: 奶奶认为中药是最好的。

en: My grandmother speaks slowly.
zh: 我的奶奶说话很慢。

en: My grandmother used to go out for a walk almost every day, but now she seldom, if ever, goes out.
zh: 我的奶奶过去几乎每天都出去散步，但现在她很少，甚至从不出去。

en: My grandmother can only eat soft food.
zh: 我的奶奶只能吃软的食物。

en: Grandmother carried the table by herself.
zh: 奶奶自己搬动了桌子。

en: Grandmother looked very well.
zh: 奶奶看起来气色很好。

en: My grandmother was gradually becoming forgetful and frail.
zh: 我的奶奶逐渐变得健忘和虚弱。

en: My grandmother went peacefully in the night.
zh: 我的奶奶在夜里安详地走了。

en: My grandmother is the oldest in this town.
zh: 我的奶奶是这个镇上最年长的人。

en: My grandmother is always complaining of the cold.
zh: 我的奶奶总是抱怨冷。

en: My grandmother can't see very well.
zh: 我的奶奶看不清楚东西。

en: My grandmother lived to be ninety-five years old.
zh: 我的奶奶活到了九十五岁。

en: Grandma is three and a half times your age.
zh: 奶奶的年龄是你的三倍半。

en: My grandmother's old watch has been lying in the drawer for years.
zh: 我奶奶的旧手表已经在抽屉里放了好几年了。

en: Grandmother makes a practice of keeping early hours.
zh: 奶奶养成了早睡早起的习惯。

en: In my grandmother's lifetime, both telephones and computers have become commonplace.
zh: 在我奶奶的一生中，电话和电脑都变得很普遍了。

en: My grandmother paid my way to Boston.
zh: 我的奶奶支付了我去波士顿的费用。

en: Our grandparents would come to see us on the weekends.
zh: 我们的爷爷奶奶会在周末来看我们。

en: My grandfather goes for a walk every day.
zh: 我的爷爷每天都去散步。

en: My grandfather does moderate exercise every morning, which is why he is strong and healthy.
zh: 我的爷爷每天早上都做适度的运动，这就是他身体强壮健康的原因。

en: My grandfather is very healthy.
zh: 我的爷爷很健康。

en: Grandfather has retired because he is getting old.
zh: 爷爷因为年纪大了而退休了。

en: My grandfather has retired because he's grown old.
zh: 我爷爷因为年纪大了，所以退休了。

en: Grandfather is still very active for his age.
zh: 爷爷这个年纪了，还很活跃。

en: Because of his age, my grandfather doesn't hear well.
zh: 因为年纪大了，我爷爷听力不好。

en: My grandfather comes from Osaka.
zh: 我爷爷来自大阪。

en: My grandfather is from Osaka.
zh: 我爷爷是大阪人。

en: My grandfather keeps early hours.
zh: 我爷爷早睡早起。

en: My grandfather was wounded in the war.
zh: 我爷爷在战争中受了伤。

en: My grandfather has snowy white hair.
zh: 我爷爷有一头雪白的头发。

en: My grandfather tells us about old things.
zh: 我爷爷给我们讲过去的事情。

en: My grandfather wants to live quietly for the rest of his life.
zh: 我爷爷想在余生过平静的生活。

en: My grandfather died shortly after my birth.
zh: 我爷爷在我出生后不久就去世了。

en: My grandfather gave me a birthday present.
zh: 我爷爷给了我一份生日礼物。

en: My grandfather nodded and smiled at me.
zh: 我爷爷点点头，对我笑了笑。

en: Grandfather nodded toward me.
zh: 爷爷朝我点了点头。

en: My grandfather still endeavors to absorb new ideas.
zh: 我爷爷仍然努力吸收新的想法。

en: My grandfather has lived in Kyoto for over 50 years, so he knows his way about.
zh: 我爷爷在京都住了50多年，所以他对那里很熟悉。

en: My grandfather often nods over his newspaper.
zh: 我爷爷经常看着报纸打瞌睡。

en: My grandfather used to make furniture for himself.
zh: 我爷爷过去常常自己做家具。

en: My grandfather would often read and study at this desk.
zh: 我爷爷过去常常在这张桌子上读书和学习。

en: My grandfather is still sound in mind and body.
zh: 我爷爷仍然身心健康。

en: My grandfather sometimes talks to himself when he's alone.
zh: 我爷爷有时独自一人时会自言自语。

en: Grandfather is napping on the sofa.
zh: 爷爷正在沙发上小睡。

en: My grandfather cannot walk without a stick.
zh: 我爷爷没有拐杖就不能走路。

en: My grandfather was always grumbling about something or other.
zh: 我爷爷总是抱怨这抱怨那的。

en: My grandfather always sits in this chair.
zh: 我爷爷总是坐在这把椅子上。

en: My grandfather lived to be ninety-nine years old.
zh: 我爷爷活到了九十九岁。

en: My grandfather is in his nineties.
zh: 我爷爷九十多岁了。

en: My grandfather is 90 years old and very lively.
zh: 我爷爷九十岁了，而且非常精神。

en: My grandfather died of a disease at eighty.
zh: 我爷爷八十岁时因病去世了。

en: My grandfather is over eighty years old, but he is a good walker.
zh: 我爷爷八十多岁了，但是他很会走路。

en: My grandfather died five years ago.
zh: 我爷爷五年前去世了。

en: My grandfather likes looking at colorful carp in the pond on a fine day.
zh: 我爷爷喜欢在晴朗的日子里看池塘里色彩鲜艳的鲤鱼。

en: My grandfather is planning to retire the year after next.
zh: 我爷爷计划后年退休。

en: We named him Thomas after his grandfather.
zh: 我们以他爷爷的名字给他取名为托马斯。

en: My grandfather has made me what I am.
zh: 我的爷爷成就了今天的我。

en: It is ten years since my grandfather died.
zh: 我爷爷去世十年了。

en: It's been ten years since my grandfather died.
zh: 我爷爷去世十年了。

en: After the initial shock of hearing of her grandfather's death, the girl started to cry.
zh: 听到她爷爷去世的消息，最初的震惊过后，那个女孩开始哭了。

en: My grandfather made the company what it is today.
zh: 我爷爷成就了今天的这家公司。

en: My grandfather passed away three years ago.
zh: 我爷爷三年前去世了。

en: The flag of his fatherland brought tears to his eyes.
zh: 他祖国的旗帜让他热泪盈眶。

en: She will write to me as soon as she returns to her country.
zh: 她一回到自己的国家就会给我写信。

en: My family came to live in Tokyo in my great-grandfather's time.
zh: 我的家人在我曾祖父那一代就搬到东京居住了。

en: What? A little soup and celery is all I get? I'm not a Zen monk. I can't survive on an austerity diet like this.
zh: 什么？就给我一点汤和芹菜？我又不是禅宗和尚。我不能靠这种苦行僧般的饮食生存。

en: They say Zen cultivates our mind.
zh: 他们说禅宗能培养我们的心灵。

en: They say that Zen strengthens our mind.
zh: 他们说禅宗能强化我们的心灵。

en: I will do my best.
zh: 我会尽我最大的努力。

en: I did the job to the best of my ability.
zh: 我尽我所能地完成了这项工作。

en: Rest assured that I will do my best.
zh: 请放心，我会尽我最大的努力。

en: I'll do my best.
zh: 我会尽力而为的。

en: I'll try to explain it to the best of my ability.
zh: 我会尽我所能地解释清楚。

en: If you put your best foot forward, you will succeed.
zh: 如果你全力以赴，你就会成功。

en: Fight with all your might.
zh: 竭尽全力战斗。

en: Give it all you've got.
zh: 拿出你的全部实力。

en: Shoot your wad.
zh: 孤注一掷。

en: To understand all is to forgive all.
zh: 理解一切就是原谅一切。

en: Eat everything.
zh: 全部吃掉。

en: You can't have dessert until you finish your meal.
zh: 吃完饭才能吃甜点。

en: They are all my personal belongings.
zh: 这些都是我的个人物品。

en: Put everything in my basket.
zh: 把所有东西都放到我的篮子里。

en: The whole audience got up and started to applaud.

zh: 我记得之前见过他。

en: Move along, please.
zh: 请往前走。

en: As was mentioned before, this is my basic idea.
zh: 正如之前提到的，这是我的基本想法。

en: I apologize for not writing to you before.
zh: 很抱歉之前没有给你写信。

en: Please forgive me for not having written to you earlier.
zh: 请原谅我之前没有给你写信。

en: She had three DPT shots before.
zh: 她之前打过三次百白破疫苗。

en: I couldn't recognize him, not having met him before.
zh: 我不认识他，因为之前没见过他。

en: Having met him before, I recognized him at once.
zh: 因为之前见过他，所以我立刻认出了他。

en: I found him easily, because I had met him once before.
zh: 我很容易就找到了他，因为我之前见过他一次。

en: I've heard that song before.
zh: 我以前听过那首歌。

en: You ran into him earlier, didn't you?
zh: 你早些时候碰到他了，不是吗？

en: The bright red flowers stood out among the greens.
zh: 鲜红的花朵在绿叶中格外显眼。

en: The use of bright colors is one of the features of his paintings.
zh: 使用鲜艳的色彩是他绘画的特点之一。

en: Take care of the pence, and the pounds will take care of themselves.
zh: 照顾好便士，英镑自会照顾好自己。（积少成多）

en: Making a choice always means making a sacrifice, giving up one thing for another.
zh: 做出选择总是意味着做出牺牲，放弃一样东西来换取另一样东西。

en: The choice is all up to you.
zh: 选择完全取决于你。

en: The players were terribly excited over winning the pennant.
zh: 球员们为赢得锦标赛而兴奋不已。

en: The players have to abide by the umpire's decision.
zh: 球员们必须遵守裁判的决定。

en: The players were in high spirits after the game.
zh: 比赛结束后，球员们情绪高涨。

en: The players marched triumphantly across the field.
zh: 球员们凯旋般地走过球场。

en: All the players were in position.
zh: 所有球员都各就各位。

en: The players scrambled for the ball.
zh: 球员们争抢着球。

en: The athletes sat around killing time, waiting for their game to start.
zh: 运动员们坐在那里打发时间，等待比赛开始。

en: Every player did his best.
zh: 每个队员都尽了最大的努力。

en: Players must adhere to the rules of the game.
zh: 玩家必须遵守游戏规则。

en: The players must abide by the rules.
zh: 玩家必须遵守规则。

en: The player was pleased with his victory.
zh: 这位选手对他的胜利感到高兴。

en: Every player is under obligation to keep the rules.
zh: 每个玩家都有义务遵守规则。

en: All the players did their best.
zh: 所有的选手都尽了最大的努力。

en: The athletes fell far short of our expectations.
zh: 运动员的表现远远低于我们的预期。

en: Players were limited in what they could and could not do to get and keep the ball.
zh: 球员在获得和保持球方面受到限制。

en: Voters are taking out their frustrations at the polls.
zh: 选民们正在通过投票来发泄他们的不满。

en: The voters won't put up for a tax hike.
zh: 选民们不会接受增税。

en: The political campaign has turned into a dirty fight at last.
zh: 这场政治运动最终变成了一场肮脏的斗争。

en: Some politicians never make good on campaign promises.
zh: 一些政客从不兑现竞选承诺。

en: Some women longed to have the right to vote.
zh: 一些妇女渴望拥有选举权。

en: Attempts to redraw voting districts have hit a wall of opposition.
zh: 重新划分选区的尝试遇到了强大的阻力。

en: The campaign succeeded and she won the election.
zh: 竞选成功了，她赢得了选举。

en: The campaign was successful and she won the election.
zh: 竞选很成功，她赢得了选举。

en: The campaign seems to be going like a bomb.
zh: 竞选似乎进展得非常顺利。

en: Everyone was glued to the TV set as the election results came in.
zh: 当选举结果出来时，每个人都守在电视机旁。

en: It is difficult to calculate the results of the election.
zh: 很难计算选举结果。

en: The results of the election will appear in the evening paper.
zh: 选举结果将出现在晚报上。

en: The result of the election will soon be analyzed.
zh: 选举结果很快将被分析。

en: The outcome of the election is doubtful.
zh: 选举的结果令人怀疑。

en: What was the outcome of the election?
zh: 选举的结果是什么？

en: The result of the election will be announced tomorrow.
zh: 选举结果将于明天公布。

en: The media has a lot of influence on the outcome of an election.
zh: 媒体对选举结果有很大的影响。

en: The election gave the party a role in the government.
zh: 这次选举使该党在政府中获得了一席之地。

en: You must appeal to public opinion to win the election.
zh: 你必须争取公众舆论才能赢得选举。

en: In most elections, whichever candidate gets the majority of the votes, wins the election.
zh: 在大多数选举中，无论哪个候选人获得多数票，都会赢得选举。

en: Whatever you pick is fine.
zh: 你选什么都可以。

en: The alternatives are liberty and death.
zh: 选择是自由和死亡。

en: The only alternatives are success and death.
zh: 唯一的选择是成功和死亡。

en: For choice, I'll take this one.
zh: 如果要我选，我会选这个。

en: I would take French, for choice.
zh: 如果要我选，我会选法语。

en: Traveling by sea is a lot of fun.
zh: 海上旅行非常有趣。

en: Some people cannot bear traveling by sea.
zh: 有些人无法忍受海上旅行。

en: Send this by sea mail.
zh: 用海运寄这个。

en: How much will it cost by sea mail?
zh: 海运要多少钱？

en: There were no signs of disorder in the ship.
zh: 船上没有任何混乱的迹象。

en: It is not certain if Mr Funada will join the new party.
zh: 还不确定船田先生是否会加入新政党。

en: The ship touched ground.
zh: 船触地了。

en: The ship's captain ordered the radio operator to send a distress signal.
zh: 船长命令无线电员发出求救信号。

en: The captain breathed new life into his tired crew.
zh: 船长给疲惫的船员注入了新的活力。

en: The captain was so angry he refused to give the crew shore leave.
zh: 船长非常生气，拒绝给船员放岸假。

en: The captain was the last person to leave the sinking ship.
zh: 船长是最后一个离开沉船的人。

en: The captain controls the whole ship.
zh: 船长控制着整艘船。

en: A captain controls his ship and its crew.
zh: 船长控制着他的船和船员。

en: The captain is responsible for the safety of passengers.
zh: 船长对乘客的安全负责。

en: The captain told us to get off the ship.
zh: 船长让我们下船。

en: The captain assured us that there would be no danger.
zh: 船长向我们保证不会有危险。

en: A captain is in charge of his ship and its crew.
zh: 船长负责他的船和船员。

en: Captains have responsibility for ship and crew.
zh: 船长对船只和船员负有责任。
